channel.title: Symbols in Bash - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: 3.1 Archiving Files on the Command Line 2 types of compression lossless - can be decompressed back to original form - bzip2, gzip, and xz - file compressed with one tool canâ€™t be decompressed by another lossy - cannot be recovered - used for images, video, and audio Archiving - tools that are used to bundle files and directories into a single file. - can install zip and unzip for working with windows files
